name: Clocked Out
description:
Play as a post-apocalyptic office worker. Discover a strange piece of technology in an abandoned office building swarmed with monsters. Slay enemies to charge your device and time travel. Travel back in time to find a way to escape.

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow keys to move (Up to jump)

Space to attack

Shift to dash

Q to time travel

Made by Lilian Chee, Daniel Fichtinger, Andrew Mun-Shimoda, John Scott, and Linnea Uunila (Team 11) for Berklee's Video Game Music Jam 2020. We made the game, composers will make music later.
